pages.title: Semi-permeable Glass
pages.text: $(italic)For a long time now, those annoying monsters that always appear at night are no longer a threat to you and only serve as a resource supplier, if at all. But that doesn't stop them from pursuing you further.$(br)You spend more time keeping those pesky monsters out of your base than you care to admit.$()

$(italic)Then you remember the gemstone glass recipe you thought up earlier.$(br)With a bit of magical energy, it should be no problem to make it not only transparent for you, but also passable (not for them!).$(br2)Bonus: If you make it look exactly like regular glass you might even be able to fool your competition.$()

Semi-permeable Glass comes in all the gemstone colors, additionally the common glass and its tinted variant.$(br2)It looks exactly like its $(l:decoration/gemstone_glass)mundane counterpart$(), but has the special property that players can pass through it without problems, while all other creatures will bounce off it like a fly off a window.
